type: Tutorial Step - Three Minutes to Play

definition.text: I'll give you a few minutes to play around with your live session, and when you are ready, we'll move on to other things!

paragraphs.text: Take some time to process what you've learned so far...

Once you are ready to move on, feel free to stop the Live Trading Session and Data Tasks. You may leave the session running if you wish, but I wouldn't trust my hard-earned cash to the demo strategy indefinitely!
There's still a few more things I want to show you before I let you go! Bear with me!
